name: recyclarr
description: Recyclarr is a CLI tool for syncing custom formats and quality profiles between Radarr/Sonarr and community templates using YAML configuration.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Apply community-maintained quality profiles to Radarr and Sonarr automatically

features.title: Yaml Configuration
features.description: Define all settings in version-controlled YAML files for reproducible setups

features.title: Trash Guides Integration
features.description: Use curated quality profiles from the TRaSH Guides community

features.title: Quality Profile Management
features.description: Synchronize preferred words, release profiles, and scoring across instances

features.title: Dry
features.description: Preview changes before applying them to avoid unintended modifications

features.title: Multi
features.description: Manage multiple Radarr and Sonarr installations from a single configuration

features.title: Automated Updates
features.description: Run on a schedule to keep quality profiles in sync with community recommendations

features.title: Custom Scoring
features.description: Override default scores for specific release groups or quality attributes
